DataElement.preferredName: CRQ-SAS 1 Last 2 Weeks How Much Shortness of Breath While Feeling Emotional Score 8 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Persons' stated observation in the last 2 weeks of their shortness of breath while feeling emotional, such as being angry or upset, using an 8 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format Past 2 Weeks How Much Shortness of Breath During Activity Feel Emotional Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation._A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present._A question about how much shortness of breath an individual had or has while doing a specific activity._A question about an individual feeling emotional, such as angry or upset._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Concepts.longName: Chronic Respiratory Questionnaire Self-Administered Standardized Format
Concepts.definition: A standardized rating scale developed by Schunemann et al in 2003, which is a self-administered instrument used to measure the health-related quality of life (HRQL) in patients with chronic airflow limitation.

Property.preferredName: Past 2 Weeks How Much Shortness of Breath During Activity Feel Emotional Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.:A question about how much shortness of breath an individual had or has while doing a specific activity.:A question about an individual feeling emotional, such as angry or upset.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 14 days before the present.

Concepts.longName: How Much Shortness of Breath During Activity
Concepts.definition: A question about how much shortness of breath an individual had or has while doing a specific activity.
A question about an individual feeling emotional, such as angry or upset.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredName: Shortness of Breath Score 8 Point Scale
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Not at All Short of Breath

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Not at All Short of Breath
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was not at all short of breath.

Concepts.longName: Not at All Short of Breath
Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was not at all short of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was a little short of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was a little short of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual experiences or experienced some shortness of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual experiences or experienced some shortness of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate shortness of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual has or had moderate shortness of breath.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Quite a Bit Short of Breath

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Quite a Bit Short of Breath
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was quite a bit short of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was quite a bit short of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very short of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was very short of breath.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was extremely short of breath.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was extremely short of breath.
